replies.body:
this is all very nice but ffs chose some photogenic people with less aggravating expressions than this I'm already over the sight of it on the main console window
srsly the look in their eyes says punch my face.
That's the look they gave when told they would have to share a house
P sure they're meant to look menacing.
Yeah they def look like they are friendly and having a good time!
Thank god, you couldn't have put it any better.
Is there going to be a live audience?
No live audience yet - we're focused on getting all the players in a studio and seeing how that goes :).
im so excited to see some oceania players this is really awesome {{champion:105}}
Yes we can finally have the fist fights I always wanted to see live
When/where can we do our predictions??
We're hoping to do something - we have a few things in the works but we aren't 100% certain if we can launch it in time! But we'll have something :).
I want these gaming houses to be in Melbourne XD
im hyped af to go to the finals again
